means: 使某物衰微，瓦解，分崩离析

sentence.Network_en: The plane would probably disintegrate at that high speed.
sentence.Network_cn: 飞机以那么高速飞行也许会四分五裂.

sentence.Network_en: During October 1918 the Austro-Hungarian Empire began to disintegrate.
sentence.Network_cn: 在1918年10月间，奥匈帝国开始瓦解。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英雄无敌4资料 ... 连环闪电 Chain Lightning 碎裂 Disintegrate 诅咒 Curse.

entry.def: If something disintegrates, it becomes seriously weakened, and is divided or destroyed.

example.ex: During October 1918 the Austro-Hungarian Empire began to disintegrate.
example.tran: 在 1918 年 10 月间，奥匈帝国开始瓦解。

entry.def: If an object or substance disintegrates, it breaks into many small pieces or parts and is destroyed.

example.tran: 挡风玻璃在时速420英里时破碎。

means.word_mean: 1. break into parts or components or lose cohesion or unity;

sentences.sentence: "the group disintegrated after the leader died"

means.word_mean: 2. cause to undergo fission or lose particles
3. lose a stored charge, magnetic flux, or current;

sentences.sentence: "the particles disintegrated during the nuclear fission process"

auth_sentence.content: When protons collide in the LHC, they disintegrate.
auth_sentence.res_content: When protons collide in the LHC, they disintegrate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When protons collide in the LHC, they disintegrate.

auth_sentence.content: Finally, the core may also disintegrate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Finally, the core may also disintegrate.

auth_sentence.content: The milk pack was soggy and looked as if it would disintegrate.
auth_sentence.res_content: The milk pack was soggy and looked as if it would disintegrate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The milk pack was soggy and looked as if it would disintegrate.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 构成整体所必需的;完整的
stems_affixes.word_buile: integr完整+al……的→adj.构成整体所必需的;完整的
integrate[v.[into,with][使]成为一体,[使]结合在一起]+ion表名词→n.综合
integr完整+ity表名词→n.正直,诚实;完整,完全
dis分开+integrate成为一体→v.分裂成小片,瓦解
integr完整+ate使……→v.[into,with][使]成为一体,[使]结合在一起

means.word_mean: (使)破裂〔分裂, 粉碎〕;(使)崩溃

sentences.en: The box was so old;it just disintegrated when I picked it up.
sentences.cn: 那箱子太破旧了, 我刚一提就散了。
